meta.label: API configuration
meta.description: Define presets for users to call the API with specific credentials, quota and parallelization parameters

params.name: separator_authentification
params.label: Authentification
params.description: Please refer to the Crowlingo documentation: https://crowlingo.com/docs/

params.name: crowlingo-token
params.label: Crowlingo API Token
params.description: Token used to query Crowlingo Services.

params.name: crowlingo-username
params.label: Crowlingo username
params.description: Username of Crowlingo account, not necessary if API token is not empty.

params.name: crowlingo-password
params.label: Crowlingo password
params.description: Password of Crowlingo account, not necessary if API token is not empty.

params.name: crowlingo-url
params.label: Crowlingo url
params.description: Base Url for Crowlingo endpoints. Set it if you have a dedicated environment.
